text: The Battle of Lade was a naval battle which occurred in 494 BC. It was fought between an alliance of the Ionian cities (joined by the Lesbians) and the Persian Empire of Darius the Great. The Persians won the revolt and this led to the end of the war.Herodotus I, 142â€“151 ==References== Category:Battles
title: Battle of Lade
